trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of object-bound smart tag with respect to how it was associated with the component.
trans-unit.target: Angir type objektet grense smart kode i forhold til hvordan det er knyttet til komponenten.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the two options for associating an object-bound smart tag to a component.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver de to alternativene for å knytte et objekt grense smart kode til en komponent.

trans-unit.source: |Smart-tag model|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |Pull|The class derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> that is associated with the component overrides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property to return the collection of smart tags for that component.| |Push|A call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method explicitly associates the specified smart tags with the specified component.| For more information about these smart-tag models, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> classes.
trans-unit.target: | Smartkortet etikett modell | Beskrivelse | |----------------------|-----------------| | Pull | Klassen som er avledet fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>som er knyttet til komponenten overstyrer egenskapen <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>for å returnere samlingen av smart koder for denne komponenten. | | Push | Et kall til metoden <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>eksplisitt knytter de angitte smart kodene den angitte komponenten. | Du finner mer informasjon om disse smartkortet koden modellene i <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>klasser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>
